## Load Packages
  
```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, wdman, jsonlite, rvest, xml2, RSelenium, here, crayon, here, magrittr)
```


```{r}
library(RSelenium)
port <- sample(4000L:5000L, 1)
rD <- RSelenium::rsDriver(verbose = FALSE, port = port)
rD

remDr <- rD$client

url <- "http://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/tercet/localityChangeNutsVersion.do"

read_html(url) %>% 
  rvest::html_nodes("#countrySelect") %>% 
  html_nodes("option") %>% 
  html_attr("value")


remDr$navigate(url)


webElem <- remDr$findElement(using = 'xpath', value = )
  )
  
  webElem$clickElement()

```
